content.question: Which of the following best identifies the primary cause of increasing acidity in the oceans?

choices.label: Agricultural fertilizer runoff into rivers that feed into the ocean
Petroleum pollution from large-scale oil tanker spills
Carbon dioxide emissions from the combustion of fossil fuels

content.answer: Carbon dioxide emissions from the combustion of fossil fuels

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
